title: Eksamen IMT3004 (2019) â€” Multiple Choice Questions (20 points)
description: Multiple Choice Questions from the IMT3004 exam 2019. Use for practice and self-testing.

questions.question: What comes first of these actions in the incident response life cycle?
What is the most correct definition of incident response out of these?
choices: Responding to unexpected activities on computer hosts or the network
A set of procedures that commence when an incident is detected
A set of preventive controls that prevent incidents from happening
Detection and analysis of suspicious network traffic

questions.question: What initial attack vector was used in the 2019 ransomware attack on Norsk Hydro?
Which malware attributed to the Sandworm threat actor was used in the cyberattack against the power grid in Ukraine in December 2015?
Which CSIRT organizational model describes a team that serves a constituency belonging to other organizations?
choices: Internal combined distributed and centralized CSIRT

questions.question: Which of these CSIRT services is a proactive service?
What list maintained by MITRE describes common software security weakness types?
Which TLP marking should be used for sharing information with peers and partner organizations within their sector or community, but not via publicly accessible channels?
Which of these incident indicators is an example of a definite indicator of an actual incident?
Which of these is NOT a containment, eradication or recovery action?
choices: Determine whether an incident has occurred
Confirm that the affected systems are functioning normally

questions.question: Which tool is used for monitoring files for unauthorized access?
What can ISPs do to prevent IP source address spoofing commonly used in DDoS attacks?
choices: Monitor BGP traffic to detect IP hijacking
Implement network ingress and egress filtering
Monitor DDoS backscatter traffic in darknets

questions.question: What is the most important step you can do to prepare to respond to a ransomware incident?
How can passive DNS be used in incident response?
choices: Discover associations among threat actors and track and block their activity
For sharing of indicators between CSIRTs to implement better IDS signatures
Anonymizing of IP addresses before uploading samples to Virus Total
As a sandbox for dynamic malware analysis

questions.question: What is an example of an atomic indicator?
In what phase in the intrusion kill chain model will antivirus be able to disrupt the intrusion?
Which of these tools is used for sharing indicators of compromise between CSIRTS?
Which of these indicators are most challenging for an attacker to replace, according to the pyramid of pain model?
Which of these indicators gives the defender the highest knowledge quality, according to the CTI matrix model?
What is the goal for the defender when using the cyber kill chain model?
choices: Stop the intrusion further down the kill chain
Implement courses of action right of hack
Move the detection and analysis up the kill chain
Stop the intrusion left of hack
